data.message: I can't even access my account so I can do NOTHING related to my account. Secuirty is a lovely thought IF you can access your account.

replies.message: Hey there. If your account is currently locked, you can try to get access by logging into your account and trying to complete the security check from the computer or mobile phone that you usually use to log into Facebook. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2bamv0T. -Kate

What part of "I can't access the account" are you not understanding? I've gone through ALL of the resets, etc and I still can't access my account. It just tells me I'm not authorized to view the information.

My friend have same problem 😫
The hacker has changed email and phone number so now my friend has no access...
Plzz Guys lisen can you give me information about forgot password
